DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study investigate anatomical relationship vein subclavian artery , brachial plexus pleura , assess depth vein skin . Specifically , follow assess : - depth vein ( mm ) - length minor axis ( mm ) - length major axis ( mm ) - artery-vein distance ( mm ) - vein-pleural distance ( mm ) - distance brachial plexus ( mm )
DOC.criteria: The volunteer must give his/her inform sign consent The volunteer must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The volunteer 18 50 year old The volunteer participate another study The volunteer exclusion period determine previous study The volunteer judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The volunteer refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform volunteer The volunteer pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The volunteer contraindication exam study Volunteer history trauma surgery axilla shoulder girdle Volunteer know history venous thrombosis axillary / subclavian vein
